__e: If this thing goes bloody, the governor, he loses a few votes.
I know that no matter how it comes about, it will be bloody, it will be hard.
Last I saw you, bloodied and broken, strung up by your wrists in that archway, and then leaving me to think you're dead, or certain never to return again, and this is how you come home?
Look at me... and see that I'm dead serious.
It may be a game to them, but, to us, it's life or death.
And I got to tell you folks, these guys take their jobs real, uh, seriously.
